pageProduct.name: Schick Hydro Silk Kit
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Go beyond a close shave with clinically proven, lasting hydration*!

The Schick® Hydro Silk® Razor features water-activated Hydra-Renew™ serum formulated with shea butter. Its 5-curve sensing blades give you incredible closeness, while following the natural shape of your body. The cartridge is just the right size for accessing hard-to-reach areas, and each blade includes unique skin guards to smooth skin and help prevent irritation.

Size: 1 x handle, 2 x blades
